source:
TEXT_FESEST901_04721_SEQ_00<tab>Jihli Aliapoh is scanning the area for an adventurer just like you.
※This quest is available for a limited time only.
target:
TEXT_FESEST901_04721_SEQ_00<tab>Jihli Aliapoh is scanning the area for an adventurer just like you.
※This quest is available for a limited time only.

source:
TEXT_FESEST901_04721_SEQ_01<tab>Jihli Aliapoh is happy to meet you in this most auspicious season of Hatching<var 1F /var>tide, a celebration inspired by her annual prophetic dreams of the legendary Twelve Archons. This year's vision, she admits, was rather unusual in that it prominently featured tonberries, creatures of myth known less for their seasonal whimsy than their habit of mercilessly stabbing things. This peculiarity is but the first of two complications facing the festivities this year─a group of sylphs is currently dismantling decorations, harrassing residents, and otherwise making a nuisance of themselves in Gridania. For an irony, the first oddity will serve to ameliorate the second, or so claims Jihli's eager new volunteer, Hamlyn. As a self-proclaimed tonberry connoisseur, Hamlyn assures you that approaching the sylphs disguised as such a terrifying (yet adorable?) creature will be sure to drive them off, and it just so happens he has a tonberry costume in your size...

※Please note that you will be unable to complete this quest after the seasonal event has ended. For details, please check the Lodestone.
target:
TEXT_FESEST901_04721_SEQ_01<tab>Jihli Aliapoh is happy to meet you in this most auspicious season of Hatching<var 1F /var>tide, a celebration inspired by her annual prophetic dreams of the legendary Twelve Archons. This year's vision, she admits, was rather unusual in that it prominently featured tonberries, creatures of myth known less for their seasonal whimsy than their habit of mercilessly stabbing things. This peculiarity is but the first of two complications facing the festivities this year─a group of sylphs is currently dismantling decorations, harrassing residents, and otherwise making a nuisance of themselves in Gridania. For an irony, the first oddity will serve to ameliorate the second, or so claims Jihli's eager new volunteer, Hamlyn. As a self-proclaimed tonberry connoisseur, Hamlyn assures you that approaching the sylphs disguised as such a terrifying (yet adorable?) creature will be sure to drive them off, and it just so happens he has a tonberry costume in your size...

※Please note that you will be unable to complete this quest after the seasonal event has ended. For details, please check the Lodestone.

source:
TEXT_FESEST901_04721_SEQ_02<tab>Hamlyn eagerly paws you into a tonberry guise and you set off to deter any rascally sylphs you might find. While this is not how you anticipated spending your Hatching<var 1F /var>tide, you comfort yourself with the knowledge that you will be enjoying the festivities in no time.

※You must be wearing the tonberry guise to complete this task.
target:
TEXT_FESEST901_04721_SEQ_02<tab>Hamlyn eagerly paws you into a tonberry guise and you set off to deter any rascally sylphs you might find. While this is not how you anticipated spending your Hatching<var 1F /var>tide, you comfort yourself with the knowledge that you will be enjoying the festivities in no time.

※You must be wearing the tonberry guise to complete this task.

source: TEXT_FESEST901_04721_SEQ_03<tab>You successfully shoo away a bevy of trouble-making sylphs. Surely not even Hamlyn's uncomfortable heavy breathing will dampen your feeling of accomplishment...probably.
target: TEXT_FESEST901_04721_SEQ_03<tab>You successfully shoo away a bevy of trouble-making sylphs. Surely not even Hamlyn's uncomfortable heavy breathing will dampen your feeling of accomplishment...probably.

source: TEXT_FESEST901_04721_SEQ_04<tab>After pawing you out of the tonberry guise again, Hamlyn bids you share your report with Jihli. The eyes of his tonberry mask glint as he clutches your slightly sweaty costume in both hands. Best not to think too hard about it.
target: TEXT_FESEST901_04721_SEQ_04<tab>After pawing you out of the tonberry guise again, Hamlyn bids you share your report with Jihli. The eyes of his tonberry mask glint as he clutches your slightly sweaty costume in both hands. Best not to think too hard about it.

source: TEXT_FESEST901_04721_SEQ_05<tab>Jihli is delighted to hear that the sylphs' mischief has been thwarted and that festival preparations are once more proceeding apace, but Nonotta shatters this fragile relief with panicked reports of mayhem in the Central Shroud. The caravan of Archon eggs─a most crucial decoration─has been beset upon by angry sylphs and the delivery mammet is malfunctioning in its attempt to prevent total highroad robbery. In this moment of distress, Hamlyn giggles his delight, as he claims to have a brilliant plan that is sure to save the day. You need only ask...
target: TEXT_FESEST901_04721_SEQ_05<tab>Jihli is delighted to hear that the sylphs' mischief has been thwarted and that festival preparations are once more proceeding apace, but Nonotta shatters this fragile relief with panicked reports of mayhem in the Central Shroud. The caravan of Archon eggs─a most crucial decoration─has been beset upon by angry sylphs and the delivery mammet is malfunctioning in its attempt to prevent total highroad robbery. In this moment of distress, Hamlyn giggles his delight, as he claims to have a brilliant plan that is sure to save the day. You need only ask...

source: TEXT_FESEST901_04721_HAMLYN_000_001<tab>Heeeeee! <snort> Now's my chance! Now all shall appreciate their splendor! <heavy breathing>
target: TEXT_FESEST901_04721_HAMLYN_000_001<tab>Heeeeee! <snort> Now's my chance! Now all shall appreciate their splendor! <heavy breathing>

source: TEXT_FESEST901_04721_JIHLIALIAPOH_000_010<tab>Greetings, friend! And a happy Hatching<var 1F /var>tide to you.
target: TEXT_FESEST901_04721_JIHLIALIAPOH_000_010<tab>Greetings, friend! And a happy Hatching<var 1F /var>tide to you.

source: TEXT_FESEST901_04721_JIHLIALIAPOH_000_011<tab>May I say that you look <var 1A 02 /var>eggs<var 1A 01 /var>quisite as always, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>? 'Tis a pleasure to see you again.
target: TEXT_FESEST901_04721_JIHLIALIAPOH_000_011<tab>May I say that you look <var 1A 02 /var>eggs<var 1A 01 /var>quisite as always, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>? 'Tis a pleasure to see you again.

source: TEXT_FESEST901_04721_JIHLIALIAPOH_000_012<tab>Allow me to introduce myself─my name is Jihli Aliapoh, and I facilitate the annual Hatching<var 1F /var>tide festivities.
target: TEXT_FESEST901_04721_JIHLIALIAPOH_000_012<tab>Allow me to introduce myself─my name is Jihli Aliapoh, and I facilitate the annual Hatching<var 1F /var>tide festivities.

source: TEXT_FESEST901_04721_JIHLIALIAPOH_000_013<tab>You are an adventurer, are you not? Might I ask for your name?
target: TEXT_FESEST901_04721_JIHLIALIAPOH_000_013<tab>You are an adventurer, are you not? Might I ask for your name?

source: TEXT_FESEST901_04721_JIHLIALIAPOH_000_014<tab><var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>! 'Tis a pleasure to make your acquaintance.
target: TEXT_FESEST901_04721_JIHLIALIAPOH_000_014<tab><var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>! 'Tis a pleasure to make your acquaintance.

source: TEXT_FESEST901_04721_JIHLIALIAPOH_000_015<tab>In case you are unaware, Hatching<var 1F /var>tide festivities were conceived a number of years ago, after I was first visited by the Twelve Archons in a stirring and prophetic dream─and I confess, I've been dreaming ever since!
target: TEXT_FESEST901_04721_JIHLIALIAPOH_000_015<tab>In case you are unaware, Hatching<var 1F /var>tide festivities were conceived a number of years ago, after I was first visited by the Twelve Archons in a stirring and prophetic dream─and I confess, I've been dreaming ever since!

source: TEXT_FESEST901_04721_JIHLIALIAPOH_000_016<tab>Oh, I am most eager to share my latest dream with you! It was...highly peculiar, to say the least. You see, I beheld visions of featured that chilling creature of legend─the tonberry!
target: TEXT_FESEST901_04721_JIHLIALIAPOH_000_016<tab>Oh, I am most eager to share my latest dream with you! It was...highly peculiar, to say the least. You see, I beheld visions of featured that chilling creature of legend─the tonberry!

source: TEXT_FESEST901_04721_JIHLIALIAPOH_000_017<tab>If past experience has taught me anything, it is that loyally recreating my dreams is sure to bring about good fortune. However, as tonberries are naught but figments of old fables, I began to doubt what I had seen...
target: TEXT_FESEST901_04721_JIHLIALIAPOH_000_017<tab>If past experience has taught me anything, it is that loyally recreating my dreams is sure to bring about good fortune. However, as tonberries are naught but figments of old fables, I began to doubt what I had seen...

source: TEXT_FESEST901_04721_JIHLIALIAPOH_000_018<tab>...But that was when this gentleman generously offered his assistance!
target: TEXT_FESEST901_04721_JIHLIALIAPOH_000_018<tab>...But that was when this gentleman generously offered his assistance!

source: TEXT_FESEST901_04721_HAMLYN_000_019<tab>(-Hamlyn-)<snort> Greetings, <var 08 E905 ((milady)) ((fine sir)) /var>! My name is Hamlyn, and I am what you might call a supreme connoisseur and passionate afficionado of all things tonberry.
target: TEXT_FESEST901_04721_HAMLYN_000_019<tab>(-Hamlyn-)<snort> Greetings, <var 08 E905 ((milady)) ((fine sir)) /var>! My name is Hamlyn, and I am what you might call a supreme connoisseur and passionate afficionado of all things tonberry.

source: TEXT_FESEST901_04721_HAMLYN_100_019<tab>As you may or may not be aware, tonberries have heads as round and adorable as any egg, which is why I believe they are the perfect addition to Hatching<var 1F /var>tide festivities. <snort> It is for this reason that I donned the superior mantle of tonberry, and presented myself to Miss Jihli here. Hee...
target: TEXT_FESEST901_04721_HAMLYN_100_019<tab>As you may or may not be aware, tonberries have heads as round and adorable as any egg, which is why I believe they are the perfect addition to Hatching<var 1F /var>tide festivities. <snort> It is for this reason that I donned the superior mantle of tonberry, and presented myself to Miss Jihli here. Hee...

source: TEXT_FESEST901_04721_JIHLIALIAPOH_000_020<tab>What luck, wouldn't you agree? I had Hamlyn prepare some tonberry guises for our other volunteers as well, and we're all hard at work preparing for the upcoming fun.
target: TEXT_FESEST901_04721_JIHLIALIAPOH_000_020<tab>What luck, wouldn't you agree? I had Hamlyn prepare some tonberry guises for our other volunteers as well, and we're all hard at work preparing for the upcoming fun.

source: TEXT_FESEST901_04721_Q1_000_021<tab>What will you say?
target: TEXT_FESEST901_04721_Q1_000_021<tab>What will you say?

source: TEXT_FESEST901_04721_A1_000_001<tab>And a lot of eggy, stabby fun it shall be!
target: TEXT_FESEST901_04721_A1_000_001<tab>And a lot of eggy, stabby fun it shall be!

source: TEXT_FESEST901_04721_A1_000_002<tab>...Tonberries? Seriously?
target: TEXT_FESEST901_04721_A1_000_002<tab>...Tonberries? Seriously?

source: TEXT_FESEST901_04721_A1_000_003<tab>If we're talking tonberry, I know a few in upper La Noscea...
target: TEXT_FESEST901_04721_A1_000_003<tab>If we're talking tonberry, I know a few in upper La Noscea...

source: TEXT_FESEST901_04721_JIHLIALIAPOH_000_022<tab>Exactly! <var 1A 02 /var>That's<var 1A 01 /var> the spirit of Hatching<var 1F /var>tide. ...Perhaps without the “stabby” part.
target: TEXT_FESEST901_04721_JIHLIALIAPOH_000_022<tab>Exactly! <var 1A 02 /var>That's<var 1A 01 /var> the spirit of Hatching<var 1F /var>tide. ...Perhaps without the “stabby” part.

source: TEXT_FESEST901_04721_HAMLYN_000_023<tab>(-Hamlyn-)Such is often the reaction of the unenlightened, yes. But it only fuels the fire of my passion! <heavy breathing>
target: TEXT_FESEST901_04721_HAMLYN_000_023<tab>(-Hamlyn-)Such is often the reaction of the unenlightened, yes. But it only fuels the fire of my passion! <heavy breathing>

source: TEXT_FESEST901_04721_HAMLYN_000_024<tab>(-Hamlyn-)You must be referring to those sightings near Bronze Lake. Perhaps you are unaware, but those creatures aren't <var 1A 02 /var>true<var 1A 01 /var> tonberries. They simply bear a vague resemblence, and thus were nicknamed...thusly.
target: TEXT_FESEST901_04721_HAMLYN_000_024<tab>(-Hamlyn-)You must be referring to those sightings near Bronze Lake. Perhaps you are unaware, but those creatures aren't <var 1A 02 /var>true<var 1A 01 /var> tonberries. They simply bear a vague resemblence, and thus were nicknamed...thusly.

source: TEXT_FESEST901_04721_HAMLYN_000_025<tab>(-Hamlyn-)No, the tonberries <var 1A 02 /var>I<var 1A 01 /var> speak of and adore above all else are the original and <var 1A 02 /var>fictional<var 1A 01 /var> creatures of eld, spoken of in legend from time immemorial. <snort> Accept no substitutes!
target: TEXT_FESEST901_04721_HAMLYN_000_025<tab>(-Hamlyn-)No, the tonberries <var 1A 02 /var>I<var 1A 01 /var> speak of and adore above all else are the original and <var 1A 02 /var>fictional<var 1A 01 /var> creatures of eld, spoken of in legend from time immemorial. <snort> Accept no substitutes!

source: TEXT_FESEST901_04721_JIHLIALIAPOH_000_026<tab>Considering my dream, I think that these festivities present an excellent opportunity to share the tonberry's natural charm with the world. There is but one problem.
target: TEXT_FESEST901_04721_JIHLIALIAPOH_000_026<tab>Considering my dream, I think that these festivities present an excellent opportunity to share the tonberry's natural charm with the world. There is but one problem.

source: TEXT_FESEST901_04721_JIHLIALIAPOH_000_027<tab>A group of sylphs has been making mischief throughout town. Playing pranks, sabotaging the decorations...
target: TEXT_FESEST901_04721_JIHLIALIAPOH_000_027<tab>A group of sylphs has been making mischief throughout town. Playing pranks, sabotaging the decorations...

source: TEXT_FESEST901_04721_HAMLYN_000_028<tab>(-Hamlyn-)Luckily, it seems but a glance of the tonberry form is enough to send those leafy brigands fleeing in terror. Is it not remarkable how such an adorable image can yet seem so repulsive to some? Does not the contradiction of the tonberry's nature invigorate your very soul!? <heavy breathing>
target: TEXT_FESEST901_04721_HAMLYN_000_028<tab>(-Hamlyn-)Luckily, it seems but a glance of the tonberry form is enough to send those leafy brigands fleeing in terror. Is it not remarkable how such an adorable image can yet seem so repulsive to some? Does not the contradiction of the tonberry's nature invigorate your very soul!? <heavy breathing>

source: TEXT_FESEST901_04721_JIHLIALIAPOH_000_029<tab>Our other volunteers are using their tonberry guises to shoo away the sylphs as best they can, but we still find ourselves short-handed. Would you be willing to assist us, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>? Just until the mischief is managed.
target: TEXT_FESEST901_04721_JIHLIALIAPOH_000_029<tab>Our other volunteers are using their tonberry guises to shoo away the sylphs as best they can, but we still find ourselves short-handed. Would you be willing to assist us, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>? Just until the mischief is managed.

source: TEXT_FESEST901_04721_JIHLIALIAPOH_000_030<tab>My sincerest thanks. Hamlyn was good enough to prepare a plethora of guises for us, so I'm sure he will have one that fits you.
target: TEXT_FESEST901_04721_JIHLIALIAPOH_000_030<tab>My sincerest thanks. Hamlyn was good enough to prepare a plethora of guises for us, so I'm sure he will have one that fits you.

source: TEXT_FESEST901_04721_JIHLIALIAPOH_000_032<tab>It seems there's a trick to getting into that tonberry guise. I'm sure Hamlyn will be happy to assist you!
target: TEXT_FESEST901_04721_JIHLIALIAPOH_000_032<tab>It seems there's a trick to getting into that tonberry guise. I'm sure Hamlyn will be happy to assist you!

source: TEXT_FESEST901_04721_HAMLYN_000_040<tab>Now then, <snort> let us commence with this most sacred of operations. Come closer... Hmhmhm...
target: TEXT_FESEST901_04721_HAMLYN_000_040<tab>Now then, <snort> let us commence with this most sacred of operations. Come closer... Hmhmhm...

source: TEXT_FESEST901_04721_HAMLYN_000_041<tab>From the moment I saw you, I knew your small frame would lend itself perfectly to my guise... What an exquisite little tonberry you shall be! <shlorp>
target: TEXT_FESEST901_04721_HAMLYN_000_041<tab>From the moment I saw you, I knew your small frame would lend itself perfectly to my guise... What an exquisite little tonberry you shall be! <shlorp>

source: TEXT_FESEST901_04721_SYSTEM_000_042<tab>You must continue wearing the tonberry guise in order to progress.
target: TEXT_FESEST901_04721_SYSTEM_000_042<tab>You must continue wearing the tonberry guise in order to progress.

source: TEXT_FESEST901_04721_SYSTEM_000_044<tab>Speak with Hamlyn to restore or prolong the garment change.
target: TEXT_FESEST901_04721_SYSTEM_000_044<tab>Speak with Hamlyn to restore or prolong the garment change.

source: TEXT_FESEST901_04721_HAMLYN_000_045<tab>Hmm... No, that's wrong. Hold still─I must make some adjustments.
target: TEXT_FESEST901_04721_HAMLYN_000_045<tab>Hmm... No, that's wrong. Hold still─I must make some adjustments.

source: TEXT_FESEST901_04721_HAMLYN_000_046<tab>Whatever is the matter? Was donning the holy guise of tonberry too euphoric? No matter─I shall dress you once more... <var 1A 02 /var>Heeeeeeeee<var 1A 01 /var>!
target: TEXT_FESEST901_04721_HAMLYN_000_046<tab>Whatever is the matter? Was donning the holy guise of tonberry too euphoric? No matter─I shall dress you once more... <var 1A 02 /var>Heeeeeeeee<var 1A 01 /var>!

source: TEXT_FESEST901_04721_SYLPHB04721_100_047<tab>This one brims with delight! What a laugh these ones shall have!
target: TEXT_FESEST901_04721_SYLPHB04721_100_047<tab>This one brims with delight! What a laugh these ones shall have!

source: TEXT_FESEST901_04721_SYLPHE04721_100_048<tab>Tee hee! Walking ones will be ever so shocked!
target: TEXT_FESEST901_04721_SYLPHE04721_100_048<tab>Tee hee! Walking ones will be ever so shocked!

source: TEXT_FESEST901_04721_SYSTEM_000_043<tab>
target: TEXT_FESEST901_04721_SYSTEM_000_043<tab>

source: TEXT_FESEST901_04721_SYLPHA04721_000_050<tab>This one put a toady one behind those shiny eggs!
target: TEXT_FESEST901_04721_SYLPHA04721_000_050<tab>This one put a toady one behind those shiny eggs!

source: TEXT_FESEST901_04721_SYLPHB04721_000_051<tab>Hee hee! Walking ones will dance and shriek!
target: TEXT_FESEST901_04721_SYLPHB04721_000_051<tab>Hee hee! Walking ones will dance and shriek!

source: TEXT_FESEST901_04721_SYSTEM_000_000_052<tab>You must be wearing the tonberry guise provided by Hamlyn in order to progress.
target: TEXT_FESEST901_04721_SYSTEM_000_000_052<tab>You must be wearing the tonberry guise provided by Hamlyn in order to progress.

source: TEXT_FESEST901_04721_SYLPHA04721_000_053<tab>Hide well, toady one! Then spring out and make the walking ones screech and jump!
target: TEXT_FESEST901_04721_SYLPHA04721_000_053<tab>Hide well, toady one! Then spring out and make the walking ones screech and jump!

source: TEXT_FESEST901_04721_SYLPHA04721_000_054<tab>Hee hee! This one can't wait!
target: TEXT_FESEST901_04721_SYLPHA04721_000_054<tab>Hee hee! This one can't wait!

source: TEXT_FESEST901_04721_Q2_000_055<tab>What will you say?
target: TEXT_FESEST901_04721_Q2_000_055<tab>What will you say?

source: TEXT_FESEST901_04721_A2_000_001<tab>Let's have some eggy, eggy, stabby fun!
target: TEXT_FESEST901_04721_A2_000_001<tab>Let's have some eggy, eggy, stabby fun!

source: TEXT_FESEST901_04721_A2_000_002<tab>Did you just call me a toady one?
target: TEXT_FESEST901_04721_A2_000_002<tab>Did you just call me a toady one?

source: TEXT_FESEST901_04721_SYLPHA04721_000_056<tab>Aaaieeeeee!
target: TEXT_FESEST901_04721_SYLPHA04721_000_056<tab>Aaaieeeeee!

source: TEXT_FESEST901_04721_SYLPHB04721_000_057<tab>Scary one! Scary one is here! Flee, flee!
target: TEXT_FESEST901_04721_SYLPHB04721_000_057<tab>Scary one! Scary one is here! Flee, flee!

source: TEXT_FESEST901_04721_SYLPHC04721_000_060<tab>Not faaair! Those ones are having all the fun!
target: TEXT_FESEST901_04721_SYLPHC04721_000_060<tab>Not faaair! Those ones are having all the fun!

source: TEXT_FESEST901_04721_SYSTEM_000_000_062<tab>You must be wearing the tonberry guise provided by Hamlyn in order to progress.
target: TEXT_FESEST901_04721_SYSTEM_000_000_062<tab>You must be wearing the tonberry guise provided by Hamlyn in order to progress.

source: TEXT_FESEST901_04721_SYLPHA04721_000_063<tab>Well, if these ones can't have fun with tusked ones, walking ones won't have any fun either! This one will make sure of it!
target: TEXT_FESEST901_04721_SYLPHA04721_000_063<tab>Well, if these ones can't have fun with tusked ones, walking ones won't have any fun either! This one will make sure of it!

source: TEXT_FESEST901_04721_Q3_000_065<tab>What will you say?
target: TEXT_FESEST901_04721_Q3_000_065<tab>What will you say?

source: TEXT_FESEST901_04721_A3_000_001<tab>But how about some eggy, eggy, <var 1A 02 /var>stabby<var 1A 01 /var> fun?
target: TEXT_FESEST901_04721_A3_000_001<tab>But how about some eggy, eggy, <var 1A 02 /var>stabby<var 1A 01 /var> fun?

source: TEXT_FESEST901_04721_A3_000_002<tab>You can have fun with <var 1A 02 /var>me<var 1A 01 /var>!
target: TEXT_FESEST901_04721_A3_000_002<tab>You can have fun with <var 1A 02 /var>me<var 1A 01 /var>!

source: TEXT_FESEST901_04721_SYLPHC04721_000_066<tab>Hyaaaaaa! Monstrous one! This is why these ones need tusked oneees!
target: TEXT_FESEST901_04721_SYLPHC04721_000_066<tab>Hyaaaaaa! Monstrous one! This is why these ones need tusked oneees!

source: TEXT_FESEST901_04721_SYLPHD04721_000_070<tab>B-But if elder one finds out...
target: TEXT_FESEST901_04721_SYLPHD04721_000_070<tab>B-But if elder one finds out...

source: TEXT_FESEST901_04721_SYLPHE04721_000_071<tab>What elder one doesn't know won't hurt elder one! Don't be a wilting one.
target: TEXT_FESEST901_04721_SYLPHE04721_000_071<tab>What elder one doesn't know won't hurt elder one! Don't be a wilting one.

source: TEXT_FESEST901_04721_SYSTEM_000_000_072<tab>You must be wearing the tonberry guise provided by Hamlyn in order to progress.
target: TEXT_FESEST901_04721_SYSTEM_000_000_072<tab>You must be wearing the tonberry guise provided by Hamlyn in order to progress.

source: TEXT_FESEST901_04721_SYLPHD04721_000_073<tab>B-But...if these ones are naughty, elder one will become scolding one...
target: TEXT_FESEST901_04721_SYLPHD04721_000_073<tab>B-But...if these ones are naughty, elder one will become scolding one...

source: TEXT_FESEST901_04721_SYLPHE04721_000_074<tab>No ones will know it was these ones! Besides, it isn't <var 1A 02 /var>that<var 1A 01 /var> naughty... Hee hee!
target: TEXT_FESEST901_04721_SYLPHE04721_000_074<tab>No ones will know it was these ones! Besides, it isn't <var 1A 02 /var>that<var 1A 01 /var> naughty... Hee hee!

source: TEXT_FESEST901_04721_Q4_000_075<tab>What will you say?
target: TEXT_FESEST901_04721_Q4_000_075<tab>What will you say?

source: TEXT_FESEST901_04721_A4_000_001<tab>Don't be naughty─have eggy, eggy, stabby fun!
target: TEXT_FESEST901_04721_A4_000_001<tab>Don't be naughty─have eggy, eggy, stabby fun!

source: TEXT_FESEST901_04721_A4_000_002<tab>I think I'll be the judge of that.
target: TEXT_FESEST901_04721_A4_000_002<tab>I think I'll be the judge of that.

source: TEXT_FESEST901_04721_SYLPHD04721_000_076<tab>Gyaaaaaa! P-Please! Th-This one didn't mean any harm!
target: TEXT_FESEST901_04721_SYLPHD04721_000_076<tab>Gyaaaaaa! P-Please! Th-This one didn't mean any harm!

source: TEXT_FESEST901_04721_SYLPHE04721_000_077<tab>Eeeeeek! Sticky one! Get it away!
target: TEXT_FESEST901_04721_SYLPHE04721_000_077<tab>Eeeeeek! Sticky one! Get it away!

source: TEXT_FESEST901_04721_HAMLYN_000_080<tab><snort> I trust you return from a job well done?
target: TEXT_FESEST901_04721_HAMLYN_000_080<tab><snort> I trust you return from a job well done?

source: TEXT_FESEST901_04721_HAMLYN_000_081<tab>I am sure Miss Jihli would like to hear the particulars. You may relay your report after I <slurp> relieve you of that outfit. Hmhmhm...
target: TEXT_FESEST901_04721_HAMLYN_000_081<tab>I am sure Miss Jihli would like to hear the particulars. You may relay your report after I <slurp> relieve you of that outfit. Hmhmhm...

source: TEXT_FESEST901_04721_HAMLYN_000_082<tab>Well? Tell us─how did the tonberry fare? <heavy breathing>
target: TEXT_FESEST901_04721_HAMLYN_000_082<tab>Well? Tell us─how did the tonberry fare? <heavy breathing>

source: TEXT_FESEST901_04721_JIHLIALIAPOH_000_085<tab>I'm glad to hear those sylphs fluttered back home. Thank you for all of your help, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>.
target: TEXT_FESEST901_04721_JIHLIALIAPOH_000_085<tab>I'm glad to hear those sylphs fluttered back home. Thank you for all of your help, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>.

source: TEXT_FESEST901_04721_HAMLYN_000_086<tab>Yes, you performed most admirably, noot only in deed but in dress. Upon beholding such selfless acts of valor as performed by the tonberry, the citizens of Gridania are sure to have warmed to our adorable paragons of pointy justice─all according to <snort> <var 1A 02 /var>plan<var 1A 01 /var>.
target: TEXT_FESEST901_04721_HAMLYN_000_086<tab>Yes, you performed most admirably, noot only in deed but in dress. Upon beholding such selfless acts of valor as performed by the tonberry, the citizens of Gridania are sure to have warmed to our adorable paragons of pointy justice─all according to <snort> <var 1A 02 /var>plan<var 1A 01 /var>.

source: TEXT_FESEST901_04721_JIHLIALIAPOH_000_087<tab>Our other volunteers are currently making the rounds and checking the rest of the decorations for any residual surprises, but I daresay we should be able to officially begin the celebrations soon.
target: TEXT_FESEST901_04721_JIHLIALIAPOH_000_087<tab>Our other volunteers are currently making the rounds and checking the rest of the decorations for any residual surprises, but I daresay we should be able to officially begin the celebrations soon.

source: TEXT_FESEST901_04721_JIHLIALIAPOH_000_088<tab>All that's left is to wait for our Archon eggs to arrive from Ul'dah!
target: TEXT_FESEST901_04721_JIHLIALIAPOH_000_088<tab>All that's left is to wait for our Archon eggs to arrive from Ul'dah!

source: TEXT_FESEST901_04721_JIHLIALIAPOH_000_089<tab>Which reminds me─Master Pawlin sends his regards. He is currently recovering from injuries sustained from particularly vicious chicken-kick, and will therefore be unable to attend Hatching<var 1F /var>tide this year...
target: TEXT_FESEST901_04721_JIHLIALIAPOH_000_089<tab>Which reminds me─Master Pawlin sends his regards. He is currently recovering from injuries sustained from particularly vicious chicken-kick, and will therefore be unable to attend Hatching<var 1F /var>tide this year...

source: TEXT_FESEST901_04721_JIHLIALIAPOH_000_090<tab>...But he generously sent us dozens and dozens of delightful eggs! So many, in fact, we had to outsource their decoration to the Goldsmiths' Guild.
target: TEXT_FESEST901_04721_JIHLIALIAPOH_000_090<tab>...But he generously sent us dozens and dozens of delightful eggs! So many, in fact, we had to outsource their decoration to the Goldsmiths' Guild.

source: TEXT_FESEST901_04721_JIHLIALIAPOH_000_091<tab>I hope you enjoy the festivities! Something tells me this shall be a Hatching<var 1F /var>tide to remember.
target: TEXT_FESEST901_04721_JIHLIALIAPOH_000_091<tab>I hope you enjoy the festivities! Something tells me this shall be a Hatching<var 1F /var>tide to remember.

source: TEXT_FESEST901_04721_NONOTTA_000_092<tab>(-Panicked Voice-)W-We have a problem!
target: TEXT_FESEST901_04721_NONOTTA_000_092<tab>(-Panicked Voice-)W-We have a problem!

source: TEXT_FESEST901_04721_JIHLIALIAPOH_000_093<tab>Nonotta! Whatever is the matter?
target: TEXT_FESEST901_04721_JIHLIALIAPOH_000_093<tab>Nonotta! Whatever is the matter?

source: TEXT_FESEST901_04721_NONOTTA_000_094<tab>It's the eggs, Jihli! The Archon eggs!
target: TEXT_FESEST901_04721_NONOTTA_000_094<tab>It's the eggs, Jihli! The Archon eggs!

source: TEXT_FESEST901_04721_NONOTTA_000_095<tab>Sylphs swarmed the shipment as it entered the Central Shroud and scrambled the delivery mammet into a frenzy─the caravan has been brought to a complete standstill!
target: TEXT_FESEST901_04721_NONOTTA_000_095<tab>Sylphs swarmed the shipment as it entered the Central Shroud and scrambled the delivery mammet into a frenzy─the caravan has been brought to a complete standstill!

source: TEXT_FESEST901_04721_NONOTTA_000_096<tab>If only you had seen it─the chaos─the carnage─the eggs! Our beautiful Archon eggs scattered across the ground, sylphs pilfering them like vultures, and that smoking mammet rampaging like an aldgoat possessed! 'Twas sheer mayhem, Jihli!
target: TEXT_FESEST901_04721_NONOTTA_000_096<tab>If only you had seen it─the chaos─the carnage─the eggs! Our beautiful Archon eggs scattered across the ground, sylphs pilfering them like vultures, and that smoking mammet rampaging like an aldgoat possessed! 'Twas sheer mayhem, Jihli!

source: TEXT_FESEST901_04721_NONOTTA_000_100<tab>The sylphs presented no demands, offered no reason behind their rampant pillaging. But they did keep squeaking about “tusked ones” and “no fair” and “walking ones shouldn't have fun if these ones can't.” What do you suppose they meant?
target: TEXT_FESEST901_04721_NONOTTA_000_100<tab>The sylphs presented no demands, offered no reason behind their rampant pillaging. But they did keep squeaking about “tusked ones” and “no fair” and “walking ones shouldn't have fun if these ones can't.” What do you suppose they meant?

source: TEXT_FESEST901_04721_JIHLIALIAPOH_000_101<tab>Ah... I heard the sylphs once held an annual spring festival, but there was a tragic incident involving one of their fighting boars. I don't believe they've held such a festival since.
target: TEXT_FESEST901_04721_JIHLIALIAPOH_000_101<tab>Ah... I heard the sylphs once held an annual spring festival, but there was a tragic incident involving one of their fighting boars. I don't believe they've held such a festival since.

source: TEXT_FESEST901_04721_JIHLIALIAPOH_000_102<tab>It must pain them to watch us cheerfully prepare for Hatching<var 1F /var>tide, and I don't mean to belittle their feelings, but... Well, we need to recover those eggs.
target: TEXT_FESEST901_04721_JIHLIALIAPOH_000_102<tab>It must pain them to watch us cheerfully prepare for Hatching<var 1F /var>tide, and I don't mean to belittle their feelings, but... Well, we need to recover those eggs.

source: TEXT_FESEST901_04721_HAMLYN_000_103<tab>Heeeeee! Then, if I may be so bold, <snort> I believe I have the perfect solution to your conundrum. <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>'s assistance will be crucial, however. <heavy breathing> You <var 1A 02 /var>will<var 1A 01 /var> lend us your aid, yes?
target: TEXT_FESEST901_04721_HAMLYN_000_103<tab>Heeeeee! Then, if I may be so bold, <snort> I believe I have the perfect solution to your conundrum. <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>'s assistance will be crucial, however. <heavy breathing> You <var 1A 02 /var>will<var 1A 01 /var> lend us your aid, yes?
